mapper.insert: INSERT INTO surveygood(goodno, surveyno, memberno, rdate) VALUES (surveygood_seq.nextval, #{surveyno}, #{memberno}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT goodno, surveyno, memberno, rdate FROM surveygood ORDER BY goodno DESC

SELECT g.goodno, g.rdate, g.surveyno, s.topic as s_topic, g.memberno, m.id, m.email FROM survey s, surveygood g, member m WHERE s.surveyno = g.surveyno AND g.surveyno = m.memberno ORDER BY goodno DESC
